item.title: Adjust the laptop's screen brightness from Emacs
item.author: whatacold@gmail.com (whatacold)
item.description: Adjust the screen brightness from Emacs If you're using i3wm on Linux, how do you adjust the laptop's screen brightness? Most of the time, I use the laptop with an external monitor. But when I am out, I have no monitors. And it seems no easy way to adjust the brightness in i3wm. Being too bright or dim is terrible for the eyes. Recently, I found a command-line tool called brightnessctl, which can adjust the brightness in a terminal.
